function.description:
Create an md5 hash for an input stream of a string. If the input is a stream it will be consumed and this construct will return the md5 string. If the input is a string this construct will return the md5 string.
You can optionally provide an output stream as the second parameter, all the data that is read from the input will be forwarded to the output stream.
